Content: An 18-year-old student of Trinity College, Kandy who had collapsed during a school rugby training session yesterday, had died at the Kandy Hospital today (02). He was a grade 12 student. Our Kandy correspondent said that the student had taken part in a road run as a part of training and then had collapsed on the road. He had died at the Kandy Hospital while receiving treatment. Incidentally, the victim was a son of a Trinity College’s non-academic staffer.
